handlers
Interface PlayerEventsHandler

All Superinterfaces:
Handler, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
HiddenPlayerHandler, PlayerHandler, PlayerHandler, PrivatePlayerHandler, RevealedPlayerHandler
public interface PlayerEventsHandler
extends Handler

handle different actions on player instance. return true if the action is valid, or false OW to undo last action if it was made before calling the handler.

Method Summary
 boolean onCardAdded(Player target, Player byWhom, Card card)

onCardAdded

boolean onCardAdded(Player target,
                    Player byWhom,
                    Card card)
called AFTER a card was given to "target" player

Parameters:
target - player that got the card
byWhom - who game him that card, null if the logic did it (no one used the UI)
card - given card
Returns:
true if player can be given the given card by that specific player, false OW

called BEFORE given card was removed from given player

Parameters:

card - the card to remove
Returns:
